name: BeatCoaster
description:
BeatCoaster is a wild rhythmic ride. Collect listeners by syncing your track with others, then check them in with a sick bass drop. Be the most mind-blowing DJ and fill up the biggest concert hall you can!

Controls:

  • Grow your listener count by using shift or clicking the left side.
  • Use arrows, W & S, or tap the right to move the blue track up and down.
  • Press spacebar or tap the screen to drop when all five colors have been collected.

Game created for the 2017 Indie Train Jam by Brice Puls, Catt Small, Rachel Bazelais, & Whit Trebella.

Download is free (click "No thanks") – feel free to tip us if you like it!
